question: Who among the following authors wrote "Mintakhab-ul-Tawarikh"?
explanation: An Indo-Persian historian and translator, Mullah Abdul Qadir Badyuni composed Muntakhab-ut-Tawarikh (Selection of Chronicles) or Tarikh-i-Bada\'uni (Bada\'uni\'s History) in 1595 AD. The work is compiled in three volumes viz. the first volume contains an account of Babur and Humayun, the second volume exclusively deals with Akbar\'s reign up to 1595 AD and the third volume describes the lives and works of Muslim religious figures,scholars, physicians and poets
